1.0.name: wordpress/tentblogger-seo-categories
1.0.description:
Improves and optimizes your permalink structure at the category level to make them as functional (and pretty) for both your users and the search engines (Google, Bing, Yahoo) that index your content!

It removes 'category' from your permalink structure (e.g. /category/name to /name).

Features: Better permalinks for SEO (Search Engines, Indexing your blog posts). Prettier category structure for your users (increased engagement, readership). Super light, fast, and no need for any setup. Works with sub-categories Redirects old category permalinks to the new ones via a 301 redirect so you don't lose any existing SEO.

Read More...
